meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by feces.
meanings.sent1: The copremic odor filled the room, making everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The copremic stains on the carpet were difficult to remove.
meanings.sent3: The copremic joke made everyone laugh, despite the gross topic.
meanings.sent4: The copremic situation at the farm was a reminder of the importance of cleanliness.
meanings.sent5: The copremic smell in the bathroom was overwhelming and unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Containing or relating to fecal matter.
meanings.sent1: The copremic sample was sent to the lab for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The copremic contamination in the water supply caused health concerns.
meanings.sent3: The copremic artwork shocked and disgusted the viewers.
meanings.sent4: The copremic evidence was crucial in solving the case.
meanings.sent5: The copremic mess in the kitchen needed immediate attention.
